content: स्यंदन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ना|नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [स्यंद्-ल्यु ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Going quickly, fleet; flowing. {@--2@} Quick, swift of foot, fleet; स्यंदना नो चतुरगाः <ls>Ki. 15. 16.</ls> --नः {@--1@} A war-chariot, a car or chariot in general; धर्मारण्यं प्रविशति गजः स्यंदनालोकभीतः <ls>Ś. 1. 33.</ls> {@--2@} Air, wind. {@--3@} A kind of tree (तिनिश). --नं {@--1@} Flowing, trickling, oozing. {@--2@} Rushing, going or flowing quickly. {@--3@} Water.
